verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' kahile more kṛṣṇera mahimā
yāṅra rūpa-guṇaiśvaryera keha nā pāya sīmā

synonyms: kṛpā kari'-showing causeless mercy; kahile—You have spoken; more—unto me; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahimā—the glories; yāṅra—whose; rūpa-guṇa-aiśvaryera—of forms, qualities and opulence; keha—anyone; nā—not; pāya—gets; sīmā—the limit.
translation: "Out of Your causeless mercy You have told me of the glories of Lord Kṛṣṇa. No one can reach the end of the opulence, qualities and forms of the Lord.
